Calculate a bootstrap confidence interval for the performance on a single train/test split

Source: R/performance.R
bootstrap_performance.Rd

Uses rsample::bootstraps(), rsample::int_pctl(), and furrr::future_map()

Usage

bootstrap_performance(
  ml_result,
  outcome_colname,
  bootstrap_times = 10000,
  alpha = 0.05
)

Arguments

ml_result

result returned from a single run_ml() call

outcome_colname

Column name as a string of the outcome variable (default NULL; the first column will be chosen automatically).

bootstrap_times

the number of boostraps to create (default: 10000)

alpha

the alpha level for the confidence interval (default 0.05 to create a 95% confidence interval)

Value

a data frame with an estimate (.estimate), lower bound (.lower), and upper bound (.upper) for each performance metric (term).

Author

Kelly Sovacool, sovacool@umich.edu

Examples

bootstrap_performance(otu_mini_bin_results_glmnet, "dx",
  bootstrap_times = 10, alpha = 0.10
)
#> Warning: Recommend at least 1000 non-missing bootstrap resamples for terms: `AUC`, `Accuracy`, `Balanced_Accuracy`, `Detection_Rate`, `F1`, `Kappa`, `Neg_Pred_Value`, `Pos_Pred_Value`, `Precision`, `Recall`, `Sensitivity`, `Specificity`, `cv_metric_AUC`, `logLoss`, `prAUC`.
#> # A tibble: 15 × 6
#>    term              .lower .estimate .upper .alpha .method   
#>    <chr>              <dbl>     <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl> <chr>     
#>  1 AUC               0.553      0.669  0.737    0.1 percentile
#>  2 Accuracy          0.522      0.608  0.669    0.1 percentile
#>  3 Balanced_Accuracy 0.512      0.608  0.682    0.1 percentile
#>  4 Detection_Rate    0.212      0.326  0.385    0.1 percentile
#>  5 F1                0.467      0.617  0.700    0.1 percentile
#>  6 Kappa             0.0256     0.212  0.352    0.1 percentile
#>  7 Neg_Pred_Value    0.469      0.619  0.784    0.1 percentile
#>  8 Pos_Pred_Value    0.430      0.597  0.714    0.1 percentile
#>  9 Precision         0.430      0.597  0.714    0.1 percentile
#> 10 Recall            0.49       0.647  0.796    0.1 percentile
#> 11 Sensitivity       0.49       0.647  0.796    0.1 percentile
#> 12 Specificity       0.533      0.569  0.637    0.1 percentile
#> 13 cv_metric_AUC     0.622      0.622  0.622    0.1 percentile
#> 14 logLoss           0.669      0.684  0.703    0.1 percentile
#> 15 prAUC             0.517      0.613  0.685    0.1 percentile
if (FALSE) {
outcome_colname <- "dx"
run_ml(otu_mini_bin, "rf", outcome_colname = "dx") %>%
  bootstrap_performance(outcome_colname,
    bootstrap_times = 10000,
    alpha = 0.05
  )
}
